languages.text: "Ткач смерти нитью кровавой сшивает раны немертвых. За твоей головою, цар{mf|ь|ица}, направлены полчища хищников. Здесь, в темных туннелях, им путь преграждают верные... но шепчет смерть: ненадолго".

"The death spinner mends the wounds of the breathing with a bloody thread. A horde of predators hunts you, {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark. Here, in the dark tunnels, the faithful stand in their way... But death is whispering for them, and they will not last long."
languages.original_text: "Ткач смерти нитью кровавой сшивает раны немертвых. За твоей головою, цар{mf|ь|ица}, направлены полчища хищников. Здесь, в темных туннелях, им путь преграждают верные... но шепчет смерть: ненадолго".

traits.locale_text: "Death weaver mends the wounds of the undying with a bloody thread. A throng of predators is hunting you, {mf|Master|Mistress}. Here, in the dark tunnels, the faithful stand in their way... But death whispers they will not be denied for long."

"Death weaver mends the wounds of the undying with a bloody thread. A throng of predators is hunting you, {mf|Master|Mistress}. Here, in the dark tunnels, the faithful stand in their way... But death whispers they will not be denied for long."

"Death weaver mends the wounds of the undying with a bloody thread. A horde of predators hunts you, {mf|Master|Mistress}. Here, in the dark tunnels, the faithful stand in their way... But death is whispering for them; they will not last long."

"Death weaver mends the wounds of the undying with a bloody thread. A horde of predators hunts you, {mf|Master|Mistress}. Here, in the dark tunnels, the faithful stand in their way... But death is whispering for them; they will not last long."

"The death spinner mends the wounds of the breathing with a bloody thread. A horde of predators hunts you, {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark. Here, in the dark tunnels, the faithful stand in their way... But death is whispering for them, and they will not last long."

"The death spinner mends the wounds of the breathing with a bloody thread. A horde of predators hunts you, {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark. Here, in the dark tunnels, the faithful stand in their way... But death is whispering for them, and they will not last long."

languages.text: «El tejedor de muerte trata las heridas de quienes respiran con un hilo ensangrentado. Una horda de depredadores le da caza, {mf|Señor|Señora} del Arca. Aquí, entre túneles oscuros, los fieles se interponen en su camino... pero la muerte les susurra y no resistirán mucho tiempo».
languages.original_text: "The death spinner mends the wounds of the breathing with a bloody thread. A horde of predators hunts you, {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark. Here, in the dark tunnels, the faithful stand in their way... But death is whispering for them, and they will not last long."

traits.locale_text: «El tejedor de muerte trata las heridas de quienes respiran con un hilo ensangrentado. Una horda de depredadores le da caza, {mf|Señor|Señora} del Arca. Aquí, entre túneles oscuros, los fieles se interponen en su camino... pero la muerte les susurra y no resistirán mucho tiempo».

languages.text: 「デススピナーは、血濡れた糸で呼吸の傷を繕う。プレデターが群れになってあなたを狩りにくるのだ、箱舟の陛下。この暗いトンネルで、忠実な者たちがプレデターの行く手を阻む…だが、死が彼らに囁きかけている。長くは持たないだろう」
languages.original_text: "The death spinner mends the wounds of the breathing with a bloody thread. A horde of predators hunts you, {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark. Here, in the dark tunnels, the faithful stand in their way... But death is whispering for them, and they will not last long."

traits.locale_text: 「デススピナーは、血濡れた糸で呼吸の傷を繕う。プレデターが群れになってあなたを狩りにくるのだ、箱舟の陛下。この暗いトンネルで、忠実な者たちがプレデターの行く手を阻む…だが、死が彼らに囁きかけている。長くは持たないだろう」

languages.text: “织亡者用鲜血的丝线修补呼吸的伤口。无数掠食者在追捕您，方舟之主。在这里，在这黑暗的隧道之中，虔诚之人会挡住他们的脚步……但死亡在向他们低语，他们活不了多久。”
languages.original_text: "The death spinner mends the wounds of the breathing with a bloody thread. A horde of predators hunts you, {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark. Here, in the dark tunnels, the faithful stand in their way... But death is whispering for them, and they will not last long."

traits.locale_text: “死亡的编织者用鲜血的丝线修补呼吸的伤口。无数掠食者在追捕您，方舟之主。在这里，在这黑暗的隧道之中，虔诚之人会挡住他们的脚步……但死亡在向他们低语，他们活不了多久。”

languages.text: "Der Todesspinner schließt die Wunden der Atmenden mit einem blutigen Faden. Eine Horde von Raubtieren jagt Euch, {mf|Lord|Lady} der Arche. Hier, in den dunklen Tunneln, stehen ihnen die Gläubigen im Weg ... Doch der Tod flüstert nach ihnen, und sie werden nicht lange bestehen können."
languages.original_text: "The death spinner mends the wounds of the breathing with a bloody thread. A horde of predators hunts you, {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark. Here, in the dark tunnels, the faithful stand in their way... But death is whispering for them, and they will not last long."

traits.locale_text: "Der Todesspinner schließt die Wunden der Atmenden mit einem blutigen Faden. Eine Horde von Raubtieren jagt Euch, {mf|Lord|Lady} der Arche. Hier, in den dunklen Tunneln, stehen ihnen die Gläubigen im Weg ... Doch der Tod flüstert nach ihnen, und sie werden nicht lange bestehen können."

languages.text: « Le tisseur de mort referme les blessures des vivants à l'aide d'un fil sanglant. Une horde de prédateurs vous traque, {mf|seigneur|seigneure} de l'Arche. Dans les sombres tunnels, les fidèles se dressent sur leur chemin... Mais la mort murmure leurs noms, et ils ne tiendront pas longtemps. »
languages.original_text: "The death spinner mends the wounds of the breathing with a bloody thread. A horde of predators hunts you, {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark. Here, in the dark tunnels, the faithful stand in their way... But death is whispering for them, and they will not last long."

traits.locale_text: « Le tisseur de mort referme les blessures des vivants à l'aide d'un fil sanglant. Une horde de prédateurs vous traque, {mf|seigneur|seigneure} de l'Arche. Dans les sombres tunnels, les fidèles se dressent sur leur chemin... Mais la mort murmure leurs noms, et ils ne tiendront pas longtemps. »

languages.text: "Ölüm dokuru, kanlı bir iplikle soluyanın yaralarını iyileştiriyor. Ark'ın {mf|Lordu|Leydisi}, sizi bir yırtıcı sürüsü avlıyor. Burada, bu karanlık tünellerde inançlılar onlara mâni oluyor... Fakat ölüm, onların isimlerini fısıldıyor. Ömürleri sona yaklaşıyor."
languages.original_text: "The death spinner mends the wounds of the breathing with a bloody thread. A horde of predators hunts you, {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark. Here, in the dark tunnels, the faithful stand in their way... But death is whispering for them, and they will not last long."
